headline: Global Payments Refocuses On Merchant Platform With Worldpay Deal And Buybacks
summary: Global Payments (NYSE:GPN) has completed its acquisition of Worldpay Holdco. The company has divested its Issuer Solutions business to FIS. Management has launched a broad business transformation program focused on streamlining operations and consolidating technology teams. The board has expanded the company’s share repurchase program. Global Payments, a major player in merchant acquiring and payment technology, is reshaping its core business mix around Worldpay while stepping away from...

headline: FIS Announces Proposed Offerings of Senior Notes
summary: JACKSONVILLE, Fla., February 26, 2026--FIS® (NYSE: FIS), a global leader in financial technology, today announced that it intends, subject to market and other considerations, to make offerings of senior notes denominated in Euro and U.S. dollars, each in multiple tranches (the "Senior Notes"). FIS intends to use the net proceeds from the Senior Notes offerings for the repayment of short-term indebtedness incurred to finance the acquisition of Global Payments’ Issuer Solutions business, with any
